statements: DELETE FROM PaaSProviders WHERE provider_id = 1 AND status = 'active'
DELETE FROM PaaSProviders WHERE status = 'inactive' AND provider_name LIKE '%Azure%'
DELETE FROM apps WHERE app_name = 'MyApp' AND user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe');
DELETE FROM Paas_Providers WHERE provider_name = 'Example Provider';
DELETE FROM developers WHERE developer_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM app_developers WHERE app_id = 1 AND developer_id = 2;
